name: Mr.Puppy Pet
description:
Download your own Mr.Puppy and make him part of your everyday life by taking good care of him!

  • Feed Mr.Puppy with different kinds of Food & Water!
  • Play minigames with Mr.Puppy!
  • Earn XP to unlock new features!
  • Customize Mr.Puppy's clothing!
  • Take good care of Mr.Puppy and get rewarded!

What are you waiting for?! Get your very own Mr.Puppy today, it is completely free!

Download Now!

More features will be added in the future.
